body_html:
Forgive me a moment while I correct myself. Remembering that TensorFlow has its own abstract C++ file system implementation under the hood, it might be worth examining this more closely to see if we're doing the right thing with locking.

In all likelihood, the contracts of this API are likely safe, but it's possible there's inconsistencies that only relate to Google. Someone who has the cycles might want to take a closer look.

body:
Forgive me a moment while I correct myself. Remembering that TensorFlow has its own abstract C++ file system implementation under the hood, it might be worth examining this more closely to see if we're doing the right thing with locking.

In all likelihood, the contracts of this API are likely safe, but it's possible there's inconsistencies that only relate to Google. Someone who has the cycles might want to take a closer look.
